member.name: T:ImageProcessor
member.summary: Collection of methods for image manipulation

member.name: M:ImageProcessor.BlackWhite(System.String[],System.Double)
member.summary: Reproduces image with only black and white pixels based on set threshold

member.name: M:ImageProcessor.Thumbnail(System.String[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a thumbnail of an image at the specified height
